ARABIC: ذَٰلِكُمْ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلْكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is your reward, so taste it. The kafirun will also have the punishment of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For you is this (punishment) to taste, for the infidels the torment of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: That is your punishment (from Allah). So taste this punishment, and know that for the unbelievers is the punishment of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We will say to them, "Endure the torment (as a consequence of your evil deeds); the unbelievers deserve nothing better than (the torment) of fire."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore taste this for now, and along with it for the disbelievers is the punishment of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is (the torment), so taste it; and surely, for the disbelievers is the torment of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This-- taste it, and (know) that for the unbelievers is the chastisement of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: That for you; therefore taste it; and that the chastisement of the Fire is for the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That (is the award), so taste it, and (know) that for disbelievers is the torment of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: That is your punishment, taste it then; and know that for those who deny the truth there is the punishment of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This! taste it then, and know that for the infidels is the torment of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Taste this, and [know] that for the faithless is the punishment of the Fire.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus (will it be said): "Taste ye then of the (punishment): for those who resist Allah, is the penalty of the Fire."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This is the torment, so taste it, and surely for the disbelievers is the torment of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: That for you, so taste it, the punishment of the Fire is for the unbelievers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Here it is; so taste it.” For the disbelievers there is the suffering of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That [is yours], so taste it." And indeed for the disbelievers is the punishment of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:14] That, chastisement, is for you, so taste it, O disbelievers, in this world; and [know] that for the disbelievers, in the Hereafter, is the chastisement of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That) is your punishment, (so taste it) in the life of this world, (and (know) that for disbelievers) in the Hereafter (is the torment of the Fire).
